word:
I tell you that which I know, for your encouragement and comfort. Let us all place ourselves in right relation to 
                                                                           102
God. What satisfaction is to be found in keeping pace with the fashions of this world? You have a better work to do. Fashion character. Use every ability, every nerve, every muscle, every thought, every action, to the glory of God. Then you will see, as you have never seen before, the salvation of God going before you.
